name: Germany
description: Germany, officially the Federal Republic of Germany,is a country in Central Europe...

name: The Netherlands
description: The Netherlands, informally Holland, is a country in Northwestern Europe...

name: France
description: France, officially the French Republic, is a country located primarily in Western Europe...

name: The Great Britain
description: Great Britain is an island in the North Atlantic Ocean off the north-west coast of continental Europe, consisting of the countries England, Scotland, and Wales. With an area of 209,331 km2, it is the largest of the British Isles, the largest European island, and the ninth-largest island in the world.

name: Canada
description: Canada is a country in North America. Its ten provinces and three territories extend from the Atlantic Ocean to the Pacific Ocean and northward into the Arctic Ocean, making it the world's second-largest country by total area, with the world's longest coastline.

name: Japan
description: Japan is an island country in East Asia. Located in the Pacific Ocean off the northeast coast of the Asian mainland, it is bordered on the west by the Sea of Japan and extends from the Sea of Okhotsk in the north to the East China Sea in the south.
